text: Three ships of the United States Navy have been named Block Island, after Block Island Sound. *, was transferred to the United Kingdom under Lend-Lease on 9 January 1943 and commissioned the following day as . *, went into service in March 1943, and was sunk in May 1944. *, was commissioned in December 1944 and active in the closing months of the Pacific War, and periodically in use until 1954. Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Block Island
